text:
e="preserve">Lokomotiv () is a professional association football club from Plovdiv, Bulgaria. The team plays in the First Professional Football League. The team's home stadium is Lokomotiv Stadium. The club was founded on 25 July 1926. The club is one of the best supported clubs in Bulgaria. The club's biggest rival is Botev Plovdiv.
The club's nicknames are "Smarfovete" (The Smurfs) and "Zheleznicharite" (The Railwaymen).
Titles.
Cup of the Soviet Army
